attributes.action: Increase in pay 50% for Care and Support staff
attributes.additional_details: Due to cost of living going up pay does not match to inflation.
attributes.background: Provide more funding and increase pay for people working in the care and support sector

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for care workers are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
